contents:
做好也许会后悔的准备去看了一眼Trudeau宣布的tweet的评论区，预期是群魔乱舞

却意外被温暖到，啊，Faith in humanity restored 😅

I'm a Canadian Conservative.

This is no time for partisan, personal attacks.

Battling in the political arena is one thing.

We don't take it into opponents homes.

If you don't have something nice or comforting to say here, please don't say anything at all.

Get well Sophie.


——————————

顺便一提，作为PM，我觉得他还是负责任的，work at home他就格外勤奋，打电话给Trump, Johnson, Conte，也有跟advisor讨论经济影响，财政部长下午再见记者，虽然是还没见到stimulus package。
